Dipo Doherty bụ onye Naijiria na-ese ihe.
A mụrụ ya na 1991, Dipo nwere Bsc
na Mechanical engineering na Mahadum Virginia. Ọ gụsịrị Master's Degree na Integrated Design and Management na Massachusetts Institute of Technology Ọrụ ya na-adabere na geometry ohere

A họpụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe ngosi na ART X Lagos 2017. Ọrụ ya so na ihe osise ndị e nyere na Arthouse's Affordable Art Auction maka ọrụ ebere na Lagos. A họpụtara ya maka ngalaba Visual Art na The Future Awards Africa 2019.
